stories.title: Project Structure + Dependencies
stories.description: Set up workspace with Three.js, WebSocket server, and build tooling
acceptanceCriteria: Folder structure created (src/, server/, hooks/, public/)
package.json configured with Three.js, ws, vite, concurrently

stories.title: 3D Workspace Scene
stories.description: Build Three.js scene with hexagonal grid, agent zones, workstations
acceptanceCriteria: 5 workstations: Read, Write, Edit, Terminal, Search
stories.learnings: Vite dev server on 5173, WebSocket on 4004. Scene renders smooth 60fps. Hexagonal grid uses CircleGeometry(1, 6). Agent zones with glowing rings + avatars. Workstations with colored cubes. OrbitControls working perfectly.

stories.title: WebSocket Server + Event Tracking
stories.description: Real-time server for tracking Claude Code tool usage
acceptanceCriteria: Event schema: timestamp, agent, tool, target, session_id
stories.learnings: Server on 4004, bidirectional sync working. Reads QUEST_PROGRESS.md, task.md, VICTORY_LOG.md. Auto-syncs every 30s. XP updates flow both ways. Session recording to JSON. Heartbeat prevents zombie connections.

stories.title: Activity Feed UI
stories.description: Right-side panel showing real-time agent activity
acceptanceCriteria: Feed displays events as they occur
Filter by agent (All, Antigravity, Business-OS, User)

stories.title: Claude Code Hook Integration
stories.description: Connect Claude Code tool usage to Ark Workshop
acceptanceCriteria: Reads tool name, file path, agent name from env vars
Triggers on Read, Write, Edit, Bash, etc.

stories.title: Agent Animation System
stories.description: Agents move to workstations when tools are used
acceptanceCriteria: Agent moves from home zone to workstation
Agent returns to home after task

stories.title: Session Recording
acceptanceCriteria: All events saved to session file
